Name: Healing Aromatic Lv.2
Description2$english: An incredible balm refined using alchemical techniques, exuding a faint herbal fragrance that can rapidly heal wounds.

recipes.Name: Intermediate: Healing Aromatic
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields 5 products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 20% and 80%, respectively.
The ointment refined from herbs doesn't look very impressive, but it can heal injuries after use.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields 5 products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 20% and 80%, respectively.
The ointment refined from herbs doesn't look very impressive, but it can heal injuries after use.

NeedMaterial.Name: Pink Musk
NeedMaterial.Description: Used in Alchemy for potion crafting.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used in Alchemy for potion crafting.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A pink decorative flower native to the Windblown Plains. Admired by the Asterians and recognized for its healing properties.

NeedMaterial.Name: Potion Catalyst - REC
NeedMaterial.Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the healing abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A material needed for Alchemy that can activate the healing abilities within raw materials.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

recipes.Name: Potion Catalyst - REC
recipes.Des: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
recipes.Des$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.

NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
